sqlMap.select:
select count(1) from mng_sequence s where s.seq_sisdel= '0'
s.sysint_sno = #searchA#
s.seq_sname like '%'||#searchB#||'%'
s.seq_sdisname like '%'||#searchC#||'%'

$pageSQLA$ select s.* , a.SYSINT_SNAME from mng_sequence s left join mng_sysint a on s.SYSINT_SNO=a.SYSINT_SNO where s.seq_sisdel= '0'
s.sysint_sno = #searchA#
s.seq_sname like '%'||#searchB#||'%'
s.seq_sdisname like '%'||#searchC#||'%'
order by nvl(s.sysint_sno,0),s.seq_nid $pageSQLB$

select count(1) from mng_tableinfo s where s.tbl_sisdel= '0'
s.SYSINT_SNO like '%$searchA$%'
s.tbl_sname like '%$searchB$%'
s.tbl_scode like '%$searchC$%'

$pageSQLA$ select s.* , a.SYSINT_SNAME from mng_tableinfo s left join mng_sysint a on s.SYSINT_SNO=a.SYSINT_SNO
where s.tbl_sisdel= '0'
s.SYSINT_SNO like '%$searchA$%'
s.tbl_sname like '%$searchB$%'
s.tbl_scode like '%$searchC$%'
$pageSQLB$
sqlMap.insert:
select nvl(max(seq_nid),0)+1 from mng_sequence
INSERT INTO mng_sequence (seq_nid, sysint_sno, seq_sname, seq_sdisname, seq_stype, seq_ntotallength, seq_scurvalue, seq_sprefix, seq_ssuffix, seq_nlength, seq_nvalue, seq_nstep, seq_ntype, seq_nyear, seq_nmonth, seq_nday, seq_sdesc, seq_sisdel, seq_sisvalid, seq_sreplyby, seq_dreplydate ) VALUES (#seq_nid#, #sysint_sno#, #seq_sname#, #seq_sdisname#, #seq_stype#, TO_NUMBER (#seq_ntotallength#), #seq_scurvalue#, #seq_sprefix#, #seq_ssuffix#, TO_NUMBER (#seq_nlength#), TO_NUMBER (#seq_nvalue#), TO_NUMBER (#seq_nstep#), 10, TO_NUMBER (#seq_nyear#), TO_NUMBER (#seq_nmonth#), TO_NUMBER (#seq_nday#), #seq_sdesc#, '0', #seq_sisvalid#, #seq_sreplyby#, SYSDATE)
sqlMap.select: select s.* , a.SYSINT_SNAME from mng_sequence s left join mng_sysint a on s.SYSINT_SNO=a.SYSINT_SNO where s.seq_nid = #id#
sqlMap.update:
update mng_sequence t set sysint_sno=#sysint_sno#, seq_sname=#seq_sname#, seq_sdisname=#seq_sdisname#, seq_stype=#seq_stype#, seq_ntotallength=TO_NUMBER(#seq_ntotallength#), seq_scurvalue=#seq_scurvalue#, seq_sprefix=#seq_sprefix#, seq_ssuffix=#seq_ssuffix#, seq_nlength=TO_NUMBER(#seq_nlength#), seq_nvalue=TO_NUMBER(#seq_nvalue#), seq_nstep=TO_NUMBER(#seq_nstep#), seq_ntype=10, seq_nyear=TO_NUMBER(#seq_nyear#), seq_nmonth=TO_NUMBER(#seq_nmonth#), seq_nday=TO_NUMBER(#seq_nday#), seq_sdesc=#seq_sdesc#, seq_sisdel='0', seq_sisvalid=#seq_sisvalid#, seq_salterby=#seq_salterby#, seq_dreplydate =sysdate
where t.seq_nid=#seq_nid#
update mng_sequence t set t.seq_sisdel = '1' where t.seq_nid =#id#
update mng_sequence t set t.seq_sisvalid = 1-t.seq_sisvalid where t.seq_nid =#id#
sqlMap.select:
select rownum,s.* from mng_sequence s where rownum <2 and s.seq_sisdel='0' and s.seq_sisvalid = '0'
s.sysint_sno is null
s.seq_sname = #seq_sname#
s.seq_stype = #seq_stype#
order by s.seq_nid
sqlMap.update: update mng_sequence t set t.seq_scurvalue = #seq_scurvalue#, t.seq_nvalue=#seq_nvalue# where t.seq_nid =#seq_nid#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from mng_sequence where seq_sisdel=0 and seq_sname = trim(#seq_sname#)
